sentences: Good luck, I hope you win, you're my favorite!
Let's be honest, you have no chance to win this one.
Go kill some people, but not too many, I have greater plans for someone else.
I hope you like the taste of metal.
Show me you have a taste for blood!
Beware of the kids on the shooting range!
Just close your eyes and shoot...
I won't lie, I saw who you play against, it's not gonna be easy...
